401.description: The request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource

403.description: The server understood the request but refuses to authorize it

404.description: The origin server did not find a current representation

415.description: The origin server is refusing to service the request because the payload is in a format not supported

429.description: Too many requests in a given amount of time

500.description: The server encountered an unexpected condition

405.description: The method received in the request-line is known by the origin server but not    supported by the target resource.

409.description: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target
